Class ControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestParentClass
      • ControllerTest
  • public class ControllerTest
extends TestParentClass
    This class contains tests for the Controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testAControllerCreatePortfolio()
      This test checks the creation of portfolio.
      void testBControllerViewPortfolio()
      This test checks the output for view portfolio on certain date.
      void testCControllerWithoutBuyingAnythingNoPortfolioCreated()
      This test checks that portfolio is not created, if user doesn't buy any stock.
      void testDControllerClubTwoStocksOfSameTickerComposition()
      This test checks two stocks of same ticker symbol that are bought on same day and is seen combined in the view portfolio.
      void testEControllerClubTwoStocksOfSameTickerComposition2()
      This test checks two stocks of same ticker symbol that are bought on different day and is seen combined in the view portfolio.
      void testFControllerOverrideSamePortfolio()
      This test checks how the same name portfolio gets overridden.
      void testGControllerInputDate()
      This test checks portfolio stocks after inputting some previous date.
      void testHControllerInputDate2()
      This test checks portfolio stocks after inputting some previous date.
      void testIControllerInvalidDate()
      This test displays message when wrong input date is given by the user.
      void testJControllerInvalidDate2()
      This test displays message when wrong input date is given by the user.
      void testKControllerInvalidDate3FutureDate()
      This test displays message when a future date is given by the user.
      void testLControllerEnterWrongOptionForSelectingPortfolio()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs wrong option for selecting portfolio.
      void testMControllerInvalidInitialChoice()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs wrong option for initial choice of inputs.
      void testNControllerInvalidInputs()
      This test tests set of all invalid inputs.
      void testOControllerHowManyStocksIsZeroSoPortfolioNotCreated()
      This test displays no portfolio creation if the number of stocks inputted by the user is zero.
      void testPControllerHowManyStocksIsZeroSoStockNotDisplayedInPortfolio()
      This test does not display the entry inside the portfolio when the number of stocks inputted by the user is zero.
      void testQController4StocksBoughtByTheUser()
      This test displays 4 stocks bought by user.
      void testRController5ByTheUser()
      This test displays 5 stocks bought by user on different dates.
      void testSController10StocksBoughtByUser()
      This test displays 10 stocks bought by user.
      void testTInitialChoiceExit()
      This test takes initial input as exit.
      void testUInvalidHowMany()
      This test tests for large input for the number of stocks.
      void testVStringEmptyForName()
      This test throws a message when portfolio name is an empty string.
      void testWViewPortfolioAndEnterWrongOption()
      This test throws error message when user inputs wrong option for displaying portfolio from a list of portfolio.
      void testXValueOfPortfolioEnterWrongPortfolioNumber()
      This test throws error message when user inputs wrong option for displaying portfolio from a list of portfolio.
      void testYBuyStockEnterWrongStockOption()
      This test displays an invalid input message when user enters invalid entry while buying stock.
      void testZAToggleBetweenMainMenuAndBack()
      This test checks the operations of back and main menu.
      void testZBBuyAndSell1()
      This test checks when stock purchased on a specifc date and sold the same stock at a later date.
      void testZBuyStockEnterInvalidHowManyStocks()
      This test displays an invalid input message when user enters invalid entry while entering number of stocks.
      void testZCBuyAndSell2()
      This test throws a message when stock purchased on a specific date and sold the same stock at a previous date than that of the purchase.
      void testZDBuyAndSell3()
      This test checks the combinations of stocks purchased while creating portfolio, stocks added and sold.
      void testZEAddtoExistingPortfolioAndSell1()
      This test checks value of portfolio (option 2) on various dates for portfolio controllerTest90.
      void testZFAddtoExistingPortfolioAndSell2()
      This test checks value of portfolio on full composition (option 3) on various dates for portfolio controllerTest90.
      void testZGAddStockToCurrentPortfolio()
      This test adds stock to the current portfolio.
      void testZHSellStockFromCurrentPortfolio()
      This test sells stocks from current portfolio.
      void testZKValueOfPortfolioOnCertainDate()
      This test checks value portfolio on certain date for past date.

      This test creates portfolio with combination of purchases and sells in different dates.

      This test checks performance by year.

      This test checks invalid input for performance.

      This test checks the total investment on various dates.

      This test checks Value of portfolio on full composition on certain date for past date.

      This test checks total amount invested on certain date.
